category: Sports Fair Committee Regulations/Article 27 (Types of Disciplinary Action)
contents: Article 27 (Types of disciplinary action) ① The types of disciplinary action are as follows for each subject. 1. Leaders and player managers: Reprimand, pay reduction (limited to coaches or player managers who receive remuneration or allowances equivalent to remuneration), suspension from competition, suspension of qualifications, dismissal, expulsion 2. Players: Reprimand, suspension from competition, Suspension of qualifications, expulsion 3. Referees: Reprimand, reduction in salary (limited to referees who receive remuneration or an allowance equivalent to remuneration), suspension from competition, suspension of qualifications, demotion, dismissal, expulsion 4. Group executives: Reprimand, reduction in salary (limited to referees receiving remuneration or an allowance equivalent to remuneration) (limited to executives who receive allowances equivalent to compensation), suspension of qualifications, dismissal, expulsion 5. Athletics department (refers to an organization equivalent to a school sports team or workplace sports team): Suspension from participation ② Deleted January 24, 2022 ③ Delete 2022. 1. 24. ④ Delete 2022. 1. 24. ⑤ Delete 2022. 1. 24. ⑥ Delete 2022. 1. 24.
